attributes.action: Stop holiday companies ripping off people who travel alone.
attributes.additional_details:
Expedia
Thomas Cook
Love Holidays
Jet2Holidays
Kayak
Lastminute.com
attributes.background: I predominantly travel alone and what really annoys me is the fact that when I search for holidays there is a huge increase in the price of flights (up to £200 sometimes) compared to the same destination, flight and hotel if the booking were for 2 people.

rejection.details:
The price of holidays is the responsibility of travel companies, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to make it illegal to charge a single supplement, if that's what you'd like to happen.
